attr.pathogenesis: bacterial overgrowth and spread to tissues
attr.complications: subcutaneous and soft tissue abscesses, intrathoracic disease

reference: Actinomycosis: etiology, clinical features, diagnosis, treatment, and management. https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC4094581/

attr.source: normal inhabitants of oral cavity and upper respiratory tract
attr.mechanism of action: anaerobic, gram-positive bacteria that spread through trauma or oral/dental infections
